title: 91/6/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 December 1990 approving the programme of measures submitted by the Greek Government for 1991 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece (only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 7 December 1990  approving the programme of measures submitted by the Greek Government for 1991 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece  (Only the Greek text is authentic)  (91/6/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
The programme of measures on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece by the Greek Government for 1991 is approved.   Article 2
This Decision is addressed to the Greek Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 December 1990.
For the Commission
Henning CHRISTOPHERSEN
Vice-President   (1) OJ No L 191, 23. 7. 1985, p. 53. (2)
OJ No L 190, 21. 7. 1990, p. 47.
